item.description:
Hello Canucks!

I thought we would take the monthly meet-up to the Gardner Museum this time for a few cocktails, fine art, and Brazilian music in the court yard.
The third Thursday event goes from 5:30-9:30, but that may be a bit too early for some, so I'll officially be there with small flag in hand at 6:30 PM. Feel free to arrive earlier if you prefer.

Tickets are $12 General Public; $10 Seniors; $5 Students, and free for members.

In addition one can attend the Jazz at the Gardner: Mark Whitfield Jr. Quartet in the Tapestry Room at 7 PM Tickets for this event are Adults $23; Seniors $18; Members $15; College Students $10. Those who attend this event can rejoin the group afterward.


Details:


Bruce's cell: 857-221-2041

If people are interested afterward, we may grab the T and head back into the city and find a pub for some late night food, and the Bruins game.

Cheers

Bruce
item.how_to_find_us: Inside not too far from main entrance area with Canadian flag and cocktail in hand!

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Gardner After Hours
